title: Researchers pose five guiding questions to improve use of AI in physicians' clinical decision-making
description: While Artificial Intelligence (AI) can be a powerful tool that physicians can use to help diagnose their patients and has great potential to improve accuracy, efficiency and patient safety, it has its drawbacks. It may distract doctors, give them too much confidence in the answers it provides, and even lead them to lose confidence in their own diagnostic judgment.

title: de Beaumont Foundation Funds First-of-Its-Kind AI Platform to Strengthen Health Communication and Combat False Narratives
description: BETHESDA, Md., Oct. 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Today, the de Beaumont Foundation announced funding support for VeriSci, a first-of-its-kind, artificial-intelligence public health communication platform that aims to help communicators translate science-backed information into clear, accurate, and culturally relevant messaging for a broad range of audiences in a variety of settings, including social media channels.

title: Impact of massive Amazon layoffs unclear in Pittsburgh region
description: Amazon is cutting 14,000 jobs as it expands its use of artificial intelligence, though it’s unclear how the move will affect the Pittsburgh area. title: Amazon Web Services To Invest At Least $5 Billion In South Korea's AI Sector By 2031
description: AWS has committed to investing a minimum of $5 billion in South Korea by 2031 to establish new artificial intelligence (AI) data centers.
content:

title: Chipmaker Nvidia becomes world's first $5 trillion company
description: Nvidia has become the first company to reach a $5 trillion valuation, driven by the booming artificial intelligence sector. This milestone highlights the significant technological shift, though concerns about an AI bubble persist. The chipmaker's rapid stock growth is fueled by immense demand for its products, with recent disclosures of substantial chip orders and strategic partnerships underscoring its dominant position.

title: Oracle Bond Risk Jumps on Concerns Over AI Spending Spree
